assignDetect(element, action, selectAll)

Assign the object a class to detect (this toggles pointer-events auto / none) todo: this could be combined with assignIgnore

Name Type Description

query string or dom element
action string

selectAll *

if string, determine whether we use querySelectorAll or querySelector
